titleEN: Glow In The Dark Rocketship Sheets
content: The glow in the dark rocketship sheets will have your kids blasting off into deep sleep in record time. The sheets display powerful rocketships blasting through the planets and stars, in addition to a glow in the dark feature that makes the cosmos come to life.

Take your love of gaming to delicious new levels when you use the Tetris cookie cutters to make your tasty treats. The cookie cutters come shaped like all the classic Tetris pieces, perfect for placing a creative and retro spin on snack time.

With the voice command grocery list maker you’ll never again forget to purchase a single item while shopping. The list maker comes with 2,500 pre-loaded items so you simply say what you need and the list maker automatically prints you an easy to read and organized list.

Make your skateboard the center of attention at the park or on the streets with the light up skateboard wheels. Each luminescent wheel comes embedded with a small strip of LED lights so everyone’s eyes will be on you as you skate by, for better or for worse.

Keep others from guzzling down your best wines and liquors with the hardcore bottle labels. The labels come with appalling and gruesome title like “rat poison” and “zombie virus” to amuse and gross out your friends – or add the ideal touch to a Halloween party.

Help bring your home into the 21st century by installing the LCD door peephole. This high tech peephole utilizes a small LCD screen to let you clearly see who’s knocking at the front door without the fish-eye distortion effect found in standard peepholes.

Make any little girl’s dreams come true with the Hello Kitty bed cover. This playful hypoallergenic bed cover fits over any twin size bed and transforms it into a giant Hello Kitty your kid will never get tired of. It is also machine washable so you can keep it looking like new.

Perform all the high adrenaline moves of the Tokyo underground racing scene without breaking the law with the drifting go kart. The unique driving system allows the driver to move in every direction possible and perform incredible moves with the flick of the wrist.

Burn through fat stacks like it’s nothing when you set the dinner table with the hundred dollar bill napkins. Each napkin comes emblazoned with a hundred dollar bill graphic, so the financially challenged can feel like the rich while they eat their Ramen Noodles.

Go harder, better, faster, and stronger with your toy collection when you get your hands on these Daft Punk action figures. The iconic electronic music duo are finally in adjustable figurine form, and are looking to drop some sick beats that will rock the Barbie toy house.

The aqua farm is an excellent example of a minimal maintenance ecosystem. In this clever system, the fish poo feeds the plants – and the plants clean the water. All you have to do is remember to feed the fish! It’s perfect for the lazy aquarium enthusiast.

Make a regular day at the park one the kids will never forget with the zipline kit. After you’ve found a couple of sturdy trees, you simply set up the kit and watch the little ones soar across the park like a majestic bird – just remember to catch them at the end of the ride.

Turn your next barbecue into a seemingly endless buffet of chicken legs with this innovative cooking rack. Designed to fit most grills, the chicken leg cooking rack conveniently holds up to a dozen legs at a time so you can cook them evenly all at once.

Transporting all your beach gear just got a whole lot easier thanks to the foldable beach wagon. Now you can load up the entire family’s gear into one convenient wagon that makes loading and unloading a breeze while also keeps everything neatly organized.

The square beam flashlight illuminates an evenly lit plot of space so you can venture through the darkness with ease. The flashlight delivers a consistent shine while its strobe setting, rotating head, and waterproof casing make it great for the outdoors.

Make time for your furry friend even if you don’t actually have the time with help from the automatic ball launcher. It’s great for teaching your dog how to fetch and adjusts to different size homes with an adjustable launch distance for non-stop fetching fun.

Every other collectible in your collection will start exhibiting strange behavior once the Heisenberg action figure steps into the picture. Featuring the pork pie hat, shades, loaded handgun, and some high quality product, this Heisenberg action figure means business.

The learning thermostat brings us a step closer to the home of the future – and the possible uprising of Skynet. The thermostat remembers your preferred temperature settings when you are home and powers down the A/C when you aren’t aren’t – so you save money.

The circus is back in town and tastier than ever. The circus animal waffle maker creates fun-shaped waffles in the form of lions, elephants and other circus animals. It’s the perfect way to add a little excitement to a monotonous weekday morning breakfast.

Time will fly by once you’re in control of the Doctor Who R/C flying TARDIS. You’ll be able to relive your favorite episodes as the double blades take the TARDIS on a 30 minute flight while you control the direction with a handy remote control.

Fix your loose cabinet or any other appliance around the house with a few shots from the gun shaped screwdriver. This powerful rechargeable screwdriver is shaped like a revolver and stores up to six different drill bits so you can blast through any repair job.

The real E.T. may have gone home but thanks to the life-size E.T. replica you’ll be able to continue the adventure with this out of this world friend. Whether it’s getting chased down by the government or grabbing a slushie from the gas station, there’s never a dull moment.

With the sunscreen bottle flask you’ll be able to discretely get rip roaring drunk next time you venture out to the beach. With a capacity to store up to 8 oz of hooch, you’ll be able to get a nice buzz going as long as you remember to re-apply every couple of hours.

Turn any fridge door into an instant arcade by replacing all existing magnets with the  Tetris refrigerator magnets. These colorful magnets are shaped like the different Tetris pieces – so you can play a quick game as you stare at the fridge and realize there is nothing to eat.

Cook up bacon faster than ever with the microwave bacon rack that allows you to prepare bacon like never before. This wonderful tool lets you to hang multiple delicious strips of bacon so they cook in the air and not in the grease. The same great taste with less fat!

Keep on cooking some of the best glass long after the show goes into syndication with the Breaking Bad LEGO meth lab. You’ll have Walt, Jesse, and their love-able boss Gustavo Fring at your disposal to cook up dozens of high quality blue <del>crystals</del> bricks.

Arm yourself with the deadliest anti-rain weapon out there – the rifle umbrella. The umbrella’s handle is cleverly disguised as a rifle stock, which is not as dangerous as a real rifle – but still rather intimidating. It’s a must have for gun-lovin’ folk.

The skull half mask allows you to keep bugs out of your mouth while simultaneously intimidating everyone else on the road. The mask protects the bottom half of your face and is lightweight enough to wear comfortably for long periods of time while you ride.

Freak out your friends and family as they watch in pure shock and awe while you chop and slice away on the blood puddle cutting board. It’s the ultimate way to add a little zest to the cooking process while you maintain the area clean and 100% sanitary.

What would Star Wars sound like if it were written 400 years ago? Wonder no more – now you can experience the greatest saga of all time told in Old English and iambic pentameter with William Shakespeare’s Star Wars. A true must have for Star Wars and literature geeks.

Teach your kids that diving head first into the gaping jaws of a man-eating shark can be fun with shark’s mouth water slide. With all the excitement of a typical slip and slide, this toy features a great white shark that dares any brave soul to slide right into his mouth.

Live out your Star Wars fantasies by activating the remote controlled Millennium Falcon – the ship that made the Kessel Run in twelve parsecs. Place it in an epic battle with the Death Star, and control it to fly towards victory every time you pick it up.

The great outdoors will be no match for you with the tactical flashlight knife at your side. It features a 3″ stainless steel blade with serrated edge and a hands-free waterproof flashlight and emergency whistle – it has so many features it would make MacGyver jealous.

The Future™ has finally come for door locking technology – now you can unlock your front door using your smartphone as a key fob with this innovative key-less door lock. Using encrypted locking technology, the key-less door lock is simple, secure, and programmable.

Keep your best friend warm, clean, and protected with the dog overalls. Featuring waterproof and breathable materials, these overalls are the must have accessory for dogs during camping trips – it protects against dirt, rain, and even offers light reflectors.

Support New Mexico’s booming narcotics sector by sporting the Breaking Bad Heisenberg tee. The shirt portrays a police sketch of the southwest’s most talented and feared cook/drug kingpin in his classic style rocking the ‘stache, shades, and pork pie hat.

Add some true artistry to every beverage you consume when utilizing the screamer ice cube tray. With this unique tray, each set of ice cubes come out as small renderings of the classic expressionist painting, ‘The Scream’; it’s the ideal ice breaker for social gatherings.

Get amazing action shots with the suckiest device on the market – the squid camera mount. This unique tripod features flexible suction cup legs that instantly stick to almost any smooth surface so you to capture the most action packed photos and videos ever.

Bring out your artistic side while you prepare a delicious serving of pancakes with this fun to use pancake batter pen. This nifty pen allows you to easily create all kinds of shapes, so you can make a heart pancake for your kids, and a middle finger for your estranged husband.

Pull a hilarious prank on your buddies who like to drink until they blackout with this tribal face temporary tattoo. Simply wet the paper, apply it to your unconscious victim, and enjoy the ensuing madness as they wake up the next day to find a tribal tattoo across their face.

Keep all your prized baseball caps looking as good as the first day you bought them with the shape keeping cap washer. This innovative device is designed to go around the cap so you can wash it safely without altering the original shape and form of the cap.

When you’re traveling it’s okay to forget about things like wallets or keys – but you should be without the hoodie travel pillow. With a cozy pillows that cradles the neck and a soft hoodie that wards off any unwanted conversations, it’s an absolute must-have for any trip.

There’ll be more to your suit than meets the eye when you style it with the Transformers Autobot cufflinks. These exquisitely designed cufflinks display the Autobot symbol on the surface yet are elegant and subtle enough to wear to a formal event.

Keep the paranormal under control with help from the LEGO Ghostbusters. The set includes the original four Ghostbusters dressed from head to toe with all their gadgets, and of course their trusty and tricked out Ectomobile. Even Slimer is joining in on the action.

The criminal coffee mug provides the perfect excuse for morning tardiness. Next time you’re running late just tell your boss the truth –  you got mugged by a <del>coffee mug</del> thug with a menacing 5 o’clock shadow, aggressive demeanor, and sinister ski mask.

Reduce the risk of getting run over while on the street by installing the bicycle turn signal on your ride. It features a display screen that flashes bright red arrows you control with the push of a button in order to warn traffic behind you of any impending lane changes or turns.

Every kid in the neighborhood will be shaking in their boots when they see you charging into battle with the Nerf machine gun. This massive gun features its very own stand for maximum stability and comes with fully automatic shooting capabilities for enhanced carnage.

The bear feet slippers are the premiere way to keep your <del>paws</del> feet warm while you hibernate or walk around the house. These furry slippers envelop your feet in a fuzzy cloud of comfort and come equipped with a special non-slip sole to keep you from falling.

Chill your favorite drink without watering it down with an ice sphere. The ice sphere mold creates perfectly round 2.5″ ice balls that add a touch of elegance to any drink while their slow melting form keeps your drink from becoming too quickly watered down.

For the first time ever, villains and heroes are coming together for an epic team-up in the name of your comfort. The heroes and villains cushion goes great in any geeky living room and provides the perfect balance of good and evil.

With the easy opening key ring you’ll be able to remove and insert keys onto your key chain in a snap. Pressing down on the indicated spot automatically lifts up the key ring so you can effortlessly slide the desired key in or out without any struggle.

Turn any pit stop along the highway into a secluded relaxation spot with the trailer hitch hammock. Upon hitching it to your truck or RV, you’ll be instantly converting the back of your vehicle into a lounge area where you could kick back and take in the scenery.

The light switch sticky notes will make sure you never again forget an important task or idea before leaving the room. The simple yet innovative design fits over most light switch covers and provides just enough space to jot down a quick reminder.

There’s no better place to waste away an entire day watching cartoons than on the Spongebob Squarepants couch. The couch is shaped like our favorite underwater invertebrate and made from a soft and durable polyester fabric ideal for handling any mess.

No matter how lame your tricks are you’re guaranteed to turn heads when you ride around on the light up poly-carbonate skateboard. Ultra bright LED wheels combine with a specialized clear poly-carbonate deck to create the ultimate night riding skateboard.

The lucky pilot of the spaceship inflatable pool toy will rule the pool with an iron fist as they bombard alien scum and any other sunbather or bystander. Once you sit in the captain’s seat, you’ll be rewarded with an endless supply of water to annoy anyone around the pool area.

Garden like you would if you were in the special forces with the garden knife. This ultimate digging tool features a 7″ blade that doubles as a shovel to dig and tear through any surface or plant – if Rambo was a gardener, this is the tool he’d use.

What better way to keep all your vintage hipster garments organized and well groomed than with the mustache hangers. Each hanger is made of heavy duty nickel plated metal and shaped like a burly mustache so you can show family and friends how hip you are.

Spice up your meals by sprinkling  some extra flavor with the snow globe shakers. These festive shakers are modeled like small snow globes you get to fill with salt and pepper and contain a cuddly polar bear  to keep you company throughout your meal.

Straight from jolly old England, the solar powered waving Queen is here to say hello and wave at all who enter your home – once the sun activates the solar panel on her purse. Apart from a friendly wave, the Queen doesn’t do much else – just like in real life.

Help maintain a slim figure by having a healthy diet with the portion control plate. It fits on top of most plates and contains four separate and appropriately labeled cavities that allow you to serve ideal portions of each food group without giving into those gluttonous urges.

Avoid a public humiliation while out at a social event by making sure a couple of high heel protectors are firmly attached at the base of your heels. It’s a simple plastic cover that slips right over the thin high heel in order to prevent it from accidentally breaking.

The retro game smartphone cases offer you the chance to momentarily escape the high tech world we live in with a simple flip of the wrist. Each case features a nostalgic game ideal for keeping you entertained when you find yourself in areas with no reception.

The life size Super Mario statue brings our favorite Italian plumber to life and into our living rooms. Equipped with a thick burly mustache and plump belly, Mario stands at nearly 5 feet tall and is ready to embark on countless virtual adventures with you.

Enlist the help of the Doc and Marty to build your very own time machine with the Back To The Future LEGOs. The LEGO set includes all the characters and parts necessary to recreate the different variations of the this iconic franchise – plutonium sold separately.

Everyone at the dinner table will be shouting Mamma Mia! once they catch a glimpse of their penis shaped pasta. No matter how big the appetite, one heaping helping of this protein packed phallic-shaped pasta is all you’ll need to satisfy your hunger.

Show off your love of photography in an elegant and artistic manner with the crystal camera bookends. Each bookend is expertly handcrafted after a Canon camera and can be used as either a bookend or a very fashionable albeit over the top paperweight.

No pool? No problem! With the firefighter water blaster toy your kids will be able to enjoy summer the way it was meant to be enjoyed. The firefighter toy transforms any garden hose into a high powered water cannon that will entertain for hours on end.

Enjoy the company of Florida’s most lovable sea cow the next time you use the manatee tea infuser to prepare your favorite hot beverage. This gentle giant keeps you company as he hangs out of your tea cup while simultaneously using his ample body to infuse your drink.

Use the GPS dog collar to keep a close eye on your furry friend without having to subject them to wearing a leash. The GPS collar adjusts to fit all dog breeds and works as a great tool for hunting dogs – a must have for virtually any outdoor excursion.

The wood camouflaging powerstrip lets you keep all your electronic appliances plugged in without sacrificing the decorum of the room. The powerstrip comes in different shades of wood so that no matter what type of wooden floors are in your home, you’ll find a match.

Liven up any nighttime environment by creating dazzling and mesmerizing effects with the glow in the dark paint. This unique paint comes in various hues so you can mix and match them to add a distinctive and artistic touch to virtually anything you desire.

Now you can practice your golf putt like a real executive with the mini golf mug. Apart from holding your morning cup of Joe, the mug includes a tunnel  opening at the bottom so you can keep your skills sharp and make the workday go by a whole lot quicker.

The Neverending Story pendant has been smuggled straight out of Fantasia and can now be yours to own. This pendant features the iconic intertwined snakes consuming each other and makes a great gift for children, adults, and any fan of this classic movie.

The parental units will finally get a break from laundry duty once you begin using the perfect shirt folder. Its simple cardboard design lays flat on the table and guides you through each step in the shirt folding process so they end up perfectly folded every time.

Carry a small piece of your childhood wherever you go with the corn popper toy keychain. It’s a miniature version of the classic children’s toy we all grew up with and owned at one point in our lives – and it also works great for providing a small distraction when boredom strikes.

The swimming robot fish toy is the pet goldfish you’ve always dreamed of having. Unlike it’s living counterpart, the robot fish loves to be placed in chlorinated pool water and will play with you for hours on end. Best of all, it won’t die when you forget about it for weeks on end.

Who needs friends when you’ve got your old pal Homer Jay Simpson. Whether you feel like eating some donuts, enjoying a nice cold Duff or just laying on the couch like a lazy slob, the Homer Simpson action figure will always be there for you.

Honor your love of the guitar and all things amplifier with this lovely black amplifier pillow designed to look just like a high quality guitar amp. The amplifier pillow might not amplify sound, but it can amplify your dreams of rock stardom as you lean back and relax.

YOU SHALL NOT PASS at the dinner table when you’ve got these Lord Of The Rings themed salt and pepper shakers available — unless you are asked nicely, of course. These geeky shakers are available in many different styles, including but not limited to Gandalf fighting Saruman.

It’ll become impossible to get your kids out of the water once you introduce them to the spinning torpedo pool toy. At 10 inches long, the torpedo features a clear aerodynamic frame that travels up to 40 feet underwater while creating a glittering effect when launched.

The folding bike allows you to commute to the shadiest of neighborhoods without having to worry about having it stolen. Rather than leaving it outside at the mercy of the streets, simply fold it up into a nice compact package you can take inside your home or office.

No one enjoys the taste of metal in their mouth, which is why you’ll love having the magnetic wristband on your next construction job. It conveniently holds several nails that way you can keep them at hand and out of your mouth while you hammer away.

Even when you’re relaxing money should always be on your mind – which is why the hundred dollar bill towel is the obvious choice for a day at the beach or pool – cause everyone knows old Ben Franklin loves nothing more than to spend a day laying out in the sun.

If you love toys and sugar, you’ll go wild for the candy LEGO bricks. These colorful and delicious candies are shaped like classic LEGO bricks and hurt your mouth just like you were chewing on a non-edible one – although they taste much better than their plastic counterparts.

titleEN: Message In A Bottle USB Flashdrive
content: Send a message in a bottle in true geek fashion with this adorable message in a bottle USB flashdrive. It provides all of the romanticism of the classic letter in a bottle formula, but is capable of storing up to 4GB so you can transfer information instantly.

It’s easy to forget which key goes to the house, your office, or your secret storage locker, so take the mystery out of home entry with the house-shaped house key. The house key is designed to look like a house, so you won’t keep getting confused late at night.

Go from wide awake to fast asleep as soon as you lay down on the Corvette car bed. This novelty bed comes with a slick and flashy Corvette frame that houses a twin mattress and features a useful storage compartment ideal for keeping the room tidy.

If bribing is your thing, there’s no better way of getting junior to bathe than with money soap. This ingenious soap contains either a 1, 5, 10 or 20 dollar bill that becomes available once the soap is all used up – your  kids will be begging you to let them shower and wash their hands.

Diamonds won’t last forever when they are in the form of these diamond printed Minecraft wrapping papers. In fact, the instant your Minecraft obsessed gift recipient lays eyes on this wrapping paper he/she is likely to rip it apart faster than a basic block of dirt.

The only time it’s acceptable to dress up your pet for going outdoors is if it’s with the dog cooling vest. This stylish vest fits comfortably and features a reflective material in addition to specialized layers that facilitate evaporation to help your furry friend stay cool in the heat.

Look no further than the remote control message helicopter when you want a creative way of getting your point across. You’ll be able to customize any message up to twenty words and display it as it hovers up and down at the push of a button.

Improve your skating exponentially once you start busting tricks with the Beavis and Butthead skateboards. You can either ride around on Butthead or channel the greatness of the mighty Cornholio when you’re ready to take your skating to the next level.

The world’s best tasting food and most comfortable type of chair have joined forces to bring you the pizza slice beanbag chair. This unique chair tantalizes taste buds with its greasy and savory graphics while the triangular slice shape provides ultimate comfort.

Using the portable guitar practice tool you can learn to wail like the great guitar gods without actually investing in a pricey instrument. This portable tool mimics the chords and frets of a real guitar so you can practice and stay on top of your game wherever you go.

In case of emergency, the emergency piggy bank probably won’t help you that much but it will get you out of a small jam. It’s modeled after a standard fire alarm and features a very breakable glass cover you can strike with a hammer any time you’re short on change.

titleEN: Hundred Dollar Bill Ice Cube Mold
content: Chill your Kool-Aid just like all the big money ballers do by dropping a couple of hundred dollar bill ice cubes in. The tray is made out of a flexible plastic and makes six hundred dollars per batch – nothing’s better than some cold hard cash.

Avoid hidden puddles and other nighttime perils when walking through the rain with the illuminated umbrella. This extremely durable umbrella features a specialized 6V bulb that illuminates the ground under you to provide a safer walk in less than favorable weather.

Take your art back to its most primal element by using the wooden branches colored pencils to complete your latest masterpiece. As long as you don’t mind a splinter or two, these rustic colored pencils are just what you need to make your artwork really pop.

Beat the heat, no matter where you go as long as you’ve got the personal misting fan by your side. This handy cooling device shoots a gentle stream of water into a small fan that converts it into a nice cooling mist that caresses your face to keep you cool on the hottest days.
